meta.title: Complete Canva & AI Design Masterclass - From Zero to Professional Designer
meta.description: The most comprehensive 6-month design and content creation program. Master Canva, photo editing, video editing, AI tools, and become a professional digital designer. From absolute basics to creating stunning professional designs, social media content, and marketing materials.
meta.certification: Industry-recognized Digital Design Certification upon completion

program_overview.title: Complete Canva & AI Design Masterclass
program_overview.tagline: From 'Zero Design Skills' to Professional Digital Designer in 6 Months
program_overview.description:
This comprehensive program transforms complete beginners into professional digital designers. You'll master Canva Pro, learn professional photo and video editing, harness the power of AI design tools like Midjourney and DALL-E, and create stunning visual content that converts.

Whether you're a business owner, marketer, content creator, or aspiring designer, this program gives you all the skills needed to create professional-grade designs, manage social media visuals, build brands, and even start a design freelance business. By the end, you'll have created 50+ professional projects and be ready for real client work.
what_makes_this_different: Zero experience required - starts from absolute basics
Focuses on practical, real-world design projects
Integrates latest AI tools throughout the course
Covers both free and pro tools comprehensively
Lifetime access to all updates and new AI tools

learning_path.phase_1: Foundation (Months 1-2): Design Principles, Canva Basics, Typography, Color Theory
learning_path.phase_2: Intermediate (Months 3-4): Advanced Canva, Photo Editing, AI Tools, Brand Design
learning_path.phase_3: Advanced (Months 5-6): Video Editing, Animation, AI Mastery, Professional Projects
learning_path.phase_4: Professional (Final Weeks): Portfolio, Freelancing, Business Setup, Client Work

phase_1_foundation.title: PHASE 1: Design Foundation & Canva Mastery (Months 1-2, Weeks 1-8)
phase_1_foundation.description: Build strong design fundamentals while mastering Canva. Learn design principles, typography, color theory, and create your first professional designs.

week_1_2.title: Introduction to Design & Canva Setup
topics: What is graphic design? History and evolution
Canva Free vs Pro features comparison
File types: JPG, PNG, PDF, SVG explained
Resolution and DPI for print vs digital
Basic tools: Text, shapes, lines, frames
week_1_2.practice: Daily: 30 min Canva exploration, 1 hour design exercises

week_3_4.title: Design Principles & Composition
topics: Rule of thirds and golden ratio

week_5_6.title: Typography & Color Theory
week_5_6.practice: Create 10 different color palettes and font combinations

week_7_8.title: Canva Advanced Features & Templates
week_7_8.practice: Build template library for different use cases

month_3_4.title: Months 1-2 Continued: Social Media & Marketing Design

week_9_10.title: Social Media Design Mastery
week_9_10.practice: Design 5 posts for each major platform

week_11_12.title: Marketing Materials & Print Design
week_11_12.practice: Create marketing materials for fictional company

week_13_14.title: Logo Design & Brand Identity
topics: Types of logos: wordmark, lettermark, emblem

week_18_19.title: Real Client Project Simulation
projects: Social media campaign for product launch

week_26.title: Phase 1 Final Project
projects: Logo, stationery, social media, website mockup, marketing materials

phase_2_frontend_mastery.title: PHASE 2: Advanced Design & AI Tools Integration (Months 3-4, Weeks 9-17)
phase_2_frontend_mastery.description: Master advanced photo editing, video creation, and integrate cutting-edge AI design tools into your workflow.

month_7_8.title: Months 3-4: AI Design Tools & Advanced Photo Editing

week_27_28.title: Introduction to AI Design Tools
topics: AI in design: Overview and possibilities
Canva AI features: Magic Write, Draw, Edit
ChatGPT for design briefs and copy
week_27_28.practice: Generate 100 AI images with different styles

week_31_32.title: AI-Powered Photo Editing
topics: Face and body retouching with AI

week_35.title: Advanced Video & Animation
week_35.practice: Create daily video content for one week

week_36_37.title: Content Creation Workflow
week_36_37.practice: Create week's worth of content in one day

week_42_43.title: 3D Design & AR Basics
topics: AR filter basics for social media

week_44.title: Phase 2 Integration Project
week_44.practice: Integrate AI into all design work

week_47_48.title: Motion Design & Animation
week_47_48.practice: Create daily animations for two weeks

week_52.title: Phase 2 Capstone Project
projects: Complete visual identity with AI elements
week_52.assessment: Phase 2 Final Exam - Complex design challenge

phase_3_backend_engineering.title: PHASE 3: Professional Practice & Business (Months 5-6, Weeks 18-26)
phase_3_backend_engineering.description: Launch your design career with advanced business skills, client management, and professional portfolio development.

week_55_56.title: Pricing & Proposals
topics: Hourly vs project vs value pricing

week_71_72.title: Portfolio Development
week_71_72.practice: Review and refine all portfolio pieces

phase_4_advanced_production.title: BONUS PHASE: Lifetime Learning & Advanced Mastery
phase_4_advanced_production.description: Continuous updates with new tools, techniques, and industry developments. Access to masterclasses and advanced workshops.

week_79_80.title: AI Tools Updates
week_79_80.practice: Stay current with weekly AI updates

week_97.title: Design Psychology & Neuroscience
week_97.practice: Apply psychology principles to all designs

week_104.title: Career Advancement Support
week_104.assessment: Annual skill assessment and certification renewal

projects_throughout_course: Month 1-2: 20+ foundational design projects including logos, social media posts, marketing materials
Month 3-4: 15+ AI-enhanced projects, video content, advanced photo manipulation
Month 5-6: 10+ professional client projects, complete campaigns, business setup
Bonus: Ongoing specialty projects in chosen niche
Final: Complete brand and marketing campaign with all deliverables
skills_mastered: Design Tools: Canva Pro mastery, Adobe Creative Suite basics, Figma introduction
AI Tools: Midjourney, DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, ChatGPT, Adobe Firefly, Runway
Design Skills: Typography, Color Theory, Composition, Branding, Layout, UI/UX basics
Photo/Video: Photo editing, manipulation, video editing, animation, motion graphics
Business: Pricing, proposals, client management, marketing, freelancing, scaling
Specializations: Social media, marketing, branding, web design, print, packaging
Advanced: AI workflows, automation, 3D basics, AR filters, data visualization
Professional: Portfolio development, job search, networking, continuous learning

support_provided.live_sessions: Weekly live design critiques and Q&A
support_provided.code_review: Professional design feedback on all projects
support_provided.career_support: Portfolio reviews, job search help, client acquisition
support_provided.lifetime_access: All content, updates, new tools, and features

certification.industry_recognized: Recognized by design agencies and companies

prerequisites.education: No formal education required - open to everyone
prerequisites.equipment: Computer with internet (Canva works in browser)
prerequisites.motivation: Passion for creativity and visual communication

who_is_this_for.working_professionals: Professionals adding design skills to their toolkit
who_is_this_for.entrepreneurs: Business owners who want to DIY their marketing
who_is_this_for.freelancers: People wanting to start design freelance business
who_is_this_for.anyone: Anyone wanting to express creativity professionally

course_guarantees.job_assistance: Client acquisition support and job placement help
course_guarantees.lifetime_updates: Free access to all new tools and updates
